ayas.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
I swear by the star when it goes down.
Your companion does not err, nor does he go astray;
ayas.transliteration: mā ḍalla ṣāḥibukum wa mā ghawā

ayas.translation: Nor does he speak out of desire.
It is naught but revelation that is revealed,
The Lord of Mighty Power has taught him,
The Lord of Strength; so he attained completion,
And he is in the highest part of the horizon.
Then he drew near, then he bowed
So he was the measure of two bows or closer still.
And He revealed to His servant what He revealed.
The heart was not untrue in (making him see) what he saw.
What! do you then dispute with him as to what he saw?
And certainly he saw him in another descent,
At the farthest lote-tree;
Near which is the garden, the place to be resorted to.
When that which covers covered the lote-tree;
The eye did not turn aside, nor did it exceed the limit.
ayas.transliteration: mā zāghal baṣaru wa mā ṭaghā

ayas.arabic: لَقَدْ رَأَىٰ مِنْ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰٓ
ayas.translation: Certainly he saw of the greatest signs of his Lord.
ayas.transliteration: laqad ra-ā min āyāti rabbihil kubrā

ayas.translation: Have you then considered the Lat and the Uzza,
And Manat, the third, the last?
What! for you the males and for Him the females!
This indeed is an unjust division!

ayas.arabic: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّآ أَسْمَآءٌ سَمَّيْتُمُوهَآ أَنتُمْ وَءَابَآؤُكُم مَّآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَا مِن سُلْطَـٰنٍ ۚ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّ وَمَا تَهْوَى ٱلْأَنفُسُ ۖ وَلَقَدْ جَآءَهُم مِّن رَّبِّهِمُ ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ
ayas.translation: They are naught but names which you have named, you and your fathers; Allah has not sent for them any authority. They follow naught but conjecture and the low desires which (their) souls incline to; and certainly the guidance has come to them from their Lord.
ayas.transliteration: in hiya illā asmā-un sammaytumūhā antum wa-ābā-ukum mā anzalallāhu bihā min sulṭān ۚ in yattabi`ūna illaẓ ẓanna wa mā tahwal-anfus ۖ walaqad jā-ahum min rabbihimul hudā

ayas.translation: Or shall man have what he wishes?
Nay! for Allah is the hereafter and the former (life).

ayas.arabic: وَكَم مِّن مَّلَكٍ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ لَا تُغْنِى شَفَـٰعَتُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ أَن يَأْذَنَ ٱللَّهُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرْضَىٰٓ
ayas.translation: And how many an angel is there in the heavens whose intercession does not avail at all except after Allah has given permission to whom He pleases and chooses.
ayas.transliteration: wakam min malakin fis samāwāti lā tughnī shafā`atuhum shay-an illā min ba`di an ya-dhanallāhu liman yashā-u wayarḍā

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ لَيُسَمُّونَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ تَسْمِيَةَ ٱلْأُنثَىٰ
ayas.translation: Most surely they who do not believe in the hereafter name the angels with female names.
ayas.transliteration: innal ladhīna lā yu-minūna bil-ākhirati layusammūnal malā-ikata tasmiyatal-unthā

ayas.arabic: وَمَا لَهُم بِهِۦ مِنْ عِلْمٍ ۖ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّ ۖ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا يُغْنِى مِنَ ٱلْحَقِّ شَيْـًٔا
ayas.translation: And they have no knowledge of it; they do not follow anything but conjecture, and surely conjecture does not avail against the truth at all.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā lahum bihi min `il-m ۖ in yattabi`ūna illaẓ ẓann ۖ wa innaẓ ẓanna lā yughnī minal ḥaqqi shay-ā

ayas.arabic: فَأَعْرِضْ عَن مَّن تَوَلَّىٰ عَن ذِكْرِنَا وَلَمْ يُرِدْ إِلَّا ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا
ayas.translation: Therefore turn aside from him who turns his back upon Our reminder and does not desire anything but this world's life.
ayas.transliteration: fa-a`riḍ `an man tawallā `an dhikrinā walam yurid illal-ḥayātad dunyā

ayas.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ مَبْلَغُهُم مِّنَ ٱلْعِلْمِ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ
ayas.translation: That is their goal of knowledge; surely your Lord knows best him who goes astray from His path and He knows best him who follows the right direction.
ayas.transliteration: dhālika mablaghuhum minal `il-m ۚ inna rabbaka huwa a`lamu biman ḍalla `an sabīlihi wahuwa a`lamu bimanih-tadā

ayas.arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ لِيَجْزِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسَـٰٓـُٔوا۟ بِمَا عَمِلُوا۟ وَيَجْزِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا۟ بِٱلْحُسْنَى
ayas.translation: And Allah's is what is in the heavens and what is in the earth, that He may reward those who do evil according to what they do, and (that) He may reward those who do good with goodness.
ayas.transliteration: walillāhi mā fis samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍi liyajziyal ladhīna asā-ū bimā `amilū wayajziyal ladhīna aḥsanū bil ḥusnā

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجْتَنِبُونَ كَبَـٰٓئِرَ ٱلْإِثْمِ وَٱلْفَوَٰحِشَ إِلَّا ٱللَّمَمَ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ وَٰسِعُ ٱلْمَغْفِرَةِ ۚ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِكُمْ إِذْ أَنشَأَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِذْ أَنتُمْ أَجِنَّةٌ فِى بُطُونِ أُمَّهَـٰتِكُمْ ۖ فَلَا تُزَكُّوٓا۟ أَنفُسَكُمْ ۖ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ ٱتَّقَىٰٓ
ayas.translation: Those who keep aloof from the great sins and the indecencies but the passing idea; surely your Lord is liberal in forgiving. He knows you best when He brings you forth from the earth and when you are embryos in the wombs of your mothers; therefore do not attribute purity to your souls; He knows him best who guards (against evil).
ayas.transliteration: alladhīna yajtanibūna kabā-iral-ithmi wal fawāḥisha illallamam ۚ inna rabbaka wāsi`ul maghfirah ۚ huwa a`lamu bikum idh ansha-akum minal-arḍi wa idh antum ajinnatun fī buṭūni ummahātikum ۖ falā tuzakkū anfusakum ۖ huwa a`lamu bimanit-taqā

ayas.translation: Have you then seen him who turns his back?
And gives a little and (then) withholds.
Has he the knowledge of the unseen so that he can see?

ayas.arabic: أَمْ لَمْ يُنَبَّأْ بِمَا فِى صُحُفِ مُوسَىٰ
ayas.translation: Or, has he not been informed of what is in the scriptures of Musa?
ayas.transliteration: am lam yunabba-bimā fī ṣuḥufi mūsā

ayas.translation: And (of) Ibrahim who fulfilled (the commandments):
That no bearer of burden shall bear the burden of another-

ayas.arabic: وَأَن لَّيْسَ لِلْإِنسَـٰنِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَىٰ
ayas.translation: And that man shall have nothing but what he strives for-
ayas.transliteration: wa-an laysa lilinsāni illā mā sa`ā

ayas.translation: And that his striving shall soon be seen-
Then shall he be rewarded for it with the fullest reward-
And that to your Lord is the goal-
And that He it is Who makes (men) laugh and makes (them) weep;
And that He it is Who causes death and gives life-
And that He created pairs, the male and the female
From the small seed when it is adapted
And that on Him is the bringing forth a second time;
And that He it is Who enriches and gives to hold;
And that He is the Lord of the Sirius;
And that He did destroy the Ad of old
And Samood, so He spared not

ayas.arabic: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ هُمْ أَظْلَمَ وَأَطْغَىٰ
ayas.translation: And the people of Nuh before; surely they were most unjust and inordinate;
ayas.transliteration: waqawma nūḥin min qabl ۖ innahum kānū hum aẓlama wa-aṭghā

ayas.translation: And the overthrown cities did He overthrow,
So there covered them that which covered.
Which of your Lord's benefits will you then dispute about?
This is a warner of the warners of old.
The near event draws nigh.

ayas.arabic: لَيْسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ
ayas.translation: There shall be none besides Allah to remove it.
Do you then wonder at this announcement?
And will you laugh and not weep?
While you are indulging in varieties.
So make obeisance to Allah and serve (Him).
